name: Vulpine Pounce
text: You can change shape mid-charge and pounce on an opponent in the same round.
prerequisites: Swift Kitsune Shapechanger, base attack bonus +10, kitsune.
benefit: When you change shape into your kitsune form and use the charge action in the same round, you can make a full attack against your opponent.
text_zh: 在同一个回合内，你可以一边冲锋一边变身，同时还完成对一个对手的突袭。
benefit_zh: 若你在同一个回合内变身成狐妖形态且进行冲锋，你可以对你的对手发动全力攻击。
special_zh: 狐妖可以在任何获得专长的时候选取此专长。
